Class MoveColumnMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • ks.common.model.Move
      • scaviola.MoveColumnMove

  • public class MoveColumnMove
extends Move
    Represents the moving of a card from one row to another

    Creation date: (12/04/01 7:50 PM)

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveColumnMove

        public MoveColumnMove(Column from,
              Column draggedColumn,
              Column to,
              int numToMove)
        Move Column from one column to another.
        Parameters:
        from - the source column
        draggedColumn - the column being dragged (or null if move hasn't been made yet)
        to - the target column for the cards
        numToMove - the number of cards to move (or equal to draggedColumn.count())

      • undo

        public boolean undo(Solitaire game)
        To undo this move, we move the cards back where they came from. Doesn't matter whether they're coming from a Row or Pile.
